metadata.title: CVE-2019-15213 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2.3. There is ause-after-free caused by a malicious USB device in thedrivers/media/usb/dvb-usb/dvb-usb-init.c driver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.2.0-16.19
